info.summary:
Rolling Pivot Points is a modern update to traditional fixed calendar window Pivot Points. It depicts support and resistance levels, based on a defined rolling window and offset.
See documentation for more information.
info.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
info.param: Number of periods in the evaluation window.
Number of periods to offset the window from the current period.
info.returns: Time series of Rolling Pivot Points values.
